lenders.name: Chuck & Peggy

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do...help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an anesthesiologist who works to support his travel habits!

lenders.occupational_info: I help manage large network of devices

lenders.name: Friends of MTS Allstream

lenders.occupational_info: MTS Allstream is currently the 3rd largest telecommunications company in Canada.  This lending group is made up of Employees in the Consumer division in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada.

lenders.name: Monica et Matthieu
lenders.loan_because: it's nice to see people with hope

lenders.name: Mike and Jenn
lenders.loan_because: it is a safer investment than our mortgage right now! oh, and it seems like a brilliant idea.
lenders.occupational_info: i work at a university focusing on environmental issues, specifically restoring streams and rivers. My wife is in management but is working to become a social worker.

lenders.name: Sarah & Ray

lenders.occupational_info:
Ray: Marketing/Business Consulting
Sarah: Microbiologist

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I know how helpful it can be when someone believes in you.
lenders.occupational_info: I ran a hospitality business for fourteen years.  We assisted clients with travel planning, personal services and lifestyle management.

lenders.name: roger
lenders.occupational_info: i'm an software engineer

lenders.name: Jennifer

lenders.occupational_info: I spent 2 years at a printing factory in South China. I trained people on Macintosh computers and Pre-press equipment to make printing plates for the presses.

lenders.name: mustapha
lenders.loan_because: i want to buy supermarket
lenders.occupational_info: im engineer but i woked from 7 years as markting excutive and i want to make my own business

lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor and plan on taking it abroad when I can.

lenders.name: Alessandro
lenders.loan_because: It is my duty in this world as a human being to bring relief to those in need, and lending through Kiva does this in a scalable and repeatable way.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I love to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an animal nurse.

lenders.name: AKINTOLA
lenders.loan_because: i want to help my mum to upgrade her small business.
lenders.occupational_info: am a student,while she is a tailor tailor.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I have a great life and appreciate what I have.  I am a new teacher wanting to make a difference in the lives of children.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for the opportunities I've had in my life, but it didn't all come without a little hard work.  These people aren't as fortunate as I, but they are willing to help themselves, and therefore, I'm willing to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I save lives - okay, not really.  But I work at a hospital that does save lives, and I help manage the employee issues (human resources).

lenders.name: QUYNH-ANH
lenders.loan_because: somebody out there needs this money and could do so much more with it than I will ever be able to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an apprentice at a tattoo shop in the metro atlanta area.

lenders.name: Rhea
lenders.loan_because: Because it's a great way to help the others...

lenders.name: Marcin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: I want to impact the world around me and this is a unique and special way to actual be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage the technology that helps banks in the U.S. manage services for their customers.

lenders.name: Joe & Jen
lenders.loan_because: To make sparks

lenders.name: Traci John and Russell
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help
lenders.occupational_info: wife, mom, and part time hairdresser

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I have an office job in the United States military.

lenders.name: Mikhail and Oksana
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed with what we have and now it is time to help others.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: Compared to the entrepreneurs, I have so much and they have so little of everything except courage

lenders.name: Dd R
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is giving back blessings that God has bestowed upon me and my family.  I owe God everything, therefore I give something.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal issues and act as their assistant.  Through the attorneys I work for we seek justice on their behalf.  I also speak to women in jail and enourage them to follow God's plan for their life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to give others the same opportunity that I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I make products that clean water.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all one and what we do for each other makes a difference for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jewelry artist. I design, produce and sell my own work at shows around the Midwest of the United States.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by others in the past when I needed it so it is my honor and obligation to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I empower people to become the best they can be.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I cried when I first heard about Kiva.  I don't cry when I'm sad, I cry when things touch my soul.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find time for themselves in their busy lives.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe in sharing your blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I generate & adjust the billing for a large utility company in the Midwest of North America.

lenders.name: brett
lenders.loan_because: In my travels to the third world I have met hundreds of motivated people that lack the funds to get started. This is an amazing concept that will empower the less fortunate not through a handout but by mutual respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because:
I like supporting entrepreneurs, especially women entrepreneurs! 

"If you've come to help me, you're wasting my time, but if you've come because your liberation is bound up with mine, lets work together." -Lilla Watson
lenders.occupational_info: I work for STR Responsible Sourcing. We assist major US and European retailers ensure that the labor conditions of the factories they source from are adequate.

lenders.name: Emily
Marcelle
lenders.loan_because: There are people in need and, through loans like Kiva organises, we can help them.

lenders.name: Paulo
lenders.loan_because: I wanna buy a instrument. It's make just in Ireland. It's tin whistle. I need $30 for buy this instrument.

lenders.name: Tom & Linda
lenders.loan_because: The whole world can benefit from one small gesture.

lenders.name: Prashanth
lenders.loan_because: To give a chance for someone to better their life.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.occupation: Work for a clothing store, Ross Stores
lenders.loan_because: My 14 yr old grandson loaned first and taught us all how much we could help others and make a difference to this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big office with hundreds of others who support nearly 900 clothing stores across the US, called Ross Stores.  My job is to manage a group of 50 employees who pay all of the bills associated with our stores, offices and warehouses.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur as well and like to help fellow entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Steve & Kami
lenders.loan_because: God has given us so much, the least we could do is to help another.  We still believe that each of us making small changes can add up to big change.  We dream of a future where poverty and hunger are no more.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: God has done amazing things in my life, and I want others to feel His presence in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to glorify God in all that I do.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have what I need and want to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much - I want to show my appreciation by blessing others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time mother and homemaker, and a member of the P.E.O. sisterhood

lenders.name: Kenan
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Jami
lenders.loan_because: There are needs that I can help with.
lenders.occupational_info: Love and teach children

lenders.name: Hamid Schricker
lenders.loan_because: giving other people a chance at a better life is the most important thing anyone can do.

lenders.name: Reginald
lenders.loan_because: this site is a great idea. Microcredit is the future.

lenders.name: Symantec Aspire SW
lenders.loan_because: As part of the Symantec Aspire mentor program, I believe giving and receiving is part of the process to enable growth
lenders.occupational_info:
We protect more people from more
online threats than anyone in the world

lenders.name: Nikitas
lenders.loan_because: Resources have the most positive impact when they're in constant motion.  By American standards, I'm far from wealthy; but I've been fortunate in my life, and if I could share but a small portion of that to make an impact in even just one other person's life -- then I've made a difference... in BOTH of our lives.

lenders.name: Naninhos
lenders.loan_because: We are from South America and we want to share with people in need.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: in a blink of an eye life can change for the better and if you can help somebody accomplish his/her goals all the better!
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of paperwork.

lenders.name: K&K
lenders.loan_because: We have travelled throughout the world and feel it's now time to give something back and help others to help themselves, in a way which doesn't create or perpetuate dependence on others.

lenders.name: jonathan
lenders.loan_because: i want to give others an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a medical student and student of life.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be able to do what I love, and I think all people deserve the opportunity to pursue their own dreams.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.occupation: Communication Artist, Not For ProfitBusiness Owner

lenders.name: Srikanth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Social Justice can be brought through compassionate capitalism.

lenders.name: Shinae
lenders.loan_because:
I have been very blessed. God has provided me with everything I need to become the person he intended. I now get to share in his delight as he works through me to do the same for others in need.  
"The people curse him who holds back grain (when the public needs it), but a blessing (from God and man) is upon the head of him who sells it. He who diligently seeks good seeks (God's) favor." Proverbs 11:26-27
I loan because the Father wants to provide for all his children, and he wants us to be able to share in his joy of doing so by letting us help!
Sounds like a pretty good deal to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business student studying Finance and Spanish.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in somebody else life.  and to show other people that I care
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young boys that have been abused physically and mentally

lenders.name: Jolene
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful opportunity to be able to give someone a helping hand that will enable them to build/expand their business and create a better future for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: We build custom homes.

lenders.name: Tor Benestad
lenders.loan_because: I believe small businesses are the backbone of every community.

lenders.name: Mandava
lenders.loan_because: I trade in hope.

lenders.name: Williams Family
lenders.loan_because:
“You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden. Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, and it gives light to everyone in the house. In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

-- Matthew 5:14 - 16

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: Drive a forklift and load fuel onto trucks

lenders.name: Ackermann
lenders.loan_because: we know that a small deed can make big changes happen.
lenders.occupational_info: We are active in the field of conventional plant breeding. Our main crop is barley - our varieties are grown worldwide and it is our great pleasure to bring this added value to farmers and people everywhere.

lenders.name: ilbusca
lenders.loan_because: I don't know.
lenders.occupational_info: I can design a mechanical component and then take a nice photo of it.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It took me 49 years of sometimes serious struggle to reach my goal. Now i want to help others reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce  store and pack 230 ha of apples along the southern shore of Lake Ontario near Niagara Falls.

lenders.name: Mikkel
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I want to help others feel good about themselves. Being able to pay back a loan gives you a great self confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping other businesses focus on their core skills and outsource non core activities to my employer.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Anybody who is full of good intentions has to have the chance to improve his life with no additional fees.
lenders.occupational_info: I make some boxes do their work properly.

lenders.name: Susan & Natalie Clarke
lenders.loan_because: We care about others.
lenders.occupational_info: Middle School Student at JN Fries

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to 31 countries and I understand the need for projects like this.  In my life I have been lucky, and want to give back to the people that are like the people I have met in my travels.  Hard working entrepreneurs that seek the same opportunities that I am fortunate enough to have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the financial system , commonly known as Wall Street.  The people I work with are far removed from projects like this, but if more knew about it I think could make a meaningful difference to the global community.   I choose to make this a part of my work.

lenders.name: Jim & Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
We are always looking for ways to help with what God has blessed us with.
Kiva has provided the opportunity to connect with people around the world in an uplifting way. Thanks Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: Christian work with our local church.

lenders.name: Elisabete Miranda
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that a small amount of money can help a lot.
I believe in people's capacities to make good things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm current a business analyst in a portuguese bank. I've worked 17 years with computers and I was a teacher at University.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: the cause is good and the need is great.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm learning how to describe the workings of the universe.  I also love waffles.

lenders.name: Mary & Doug Snyder
lenders.loan_because: There is a need and, to quote Margaret Mead, "Never doubt that a group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world.  Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has."  May these ladies, and those like us who provide loans make the changes that we all so desperately need.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a used record store and provide quality music of all kinds to many different types of folks.  I also work at Yale University as a financial assistant.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky and blessed and would like to help someone else achieve their dreams and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of three children-2 boys (ages 14 and 8) and 1 girl (age 12).  I work at SarahCare part time, and do data entry work nights and weekends.  I want to spend as much time with my children as possible while still bringing in extra income.  I have an elementary education degree which I may use again one day.

lenders.name: Zerrin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the greatest gift you can recieve is the ability to give

lenders.name: Fondation Esther B.
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help our clients who live  with HIV/AIDS to set up small firm.
lenders.occupational_info:
Esther Boucicault Stanislas is the firts lady in Haiti who declared her seropositivity in radio station and television.She created " The Fondation Esther B. Stanislas" , at Saint Marc Haiti,since 1996.We are working in the field of the Psychosociale Assistance,Medicale Assistance and nutritional support with people living with the HIV / AIDS.
After traitment and psychosocial assistance,those PVVIH's are doing better,they need to work and recover their dignity.

lenders.name: Nuala
lenders.loan_because: I think my small contribution can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I managing  a group of people in a call center who sell lift tickets and season passes for a ski resort in the mountains of Colorado

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me
lenders.occupational_info: Not very important

lenders.name: Justus
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should do it
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still a student, but aside I love to be a  creative entrepreneur. I have my own creative agency. I work together with different partners all over the world, with one goal: inspire people

lenders.name: Shereef
lenders.loan_because: it enables people to improve their own quality of life in a dignified, ambitious and sustainable way.
lenders.occupational_info: Connecting lenders with entrepreneurs to alleviate poverty in northern Peru

lenders.name: Federico
lenders.loan_because: I think micro economy is a sustainable way to improve society
lenders.occupational_info: I design automatic machines, but I like other things too :)

lenders.name: Riju
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Megan & Erik
lenders.loan_because: In a world full of social injustices, we want to do whatever possible as human beings to make a difference in someone's life. Howard Zinn delivers a challenge when he says, ''To be neutral and to be passive is to collaborate with whatever is going on.'' Democracy he defines as ''not just a counting-up of votes'' but a ''counting-up of actions.''
lenders.occupational_info: As social studies teachers, we work to bring knowledge and understanding to our students in the areas of history, politics, government and geography.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see how people around the world are improving their lives and satisfying to feel I can be a part of it.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have access to credit (and preferably savings but that's a harder beast to deal with!)
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct economic research on the impact of microfinance in rural India.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Human Geography to children that are 11-13 years old.  We learn about people and places all over the world.  We just finished studying South Africa, India and Mexico.  I love to watch the students light up as they learn about new parts of their ever changing world.

lenders.name: Lis
lenders.loan_because: regardless of one's personal trials we are all connected as brothers and sisters and deserve the opportunity to better our lives. I am thankful to be able to lend and share with people who have the courage and strength to ask for support. Thank you Zach for the wonderful gift you gave me so I might share it with others! May those whose lives we touch be as spiritually blessed and filled with a loving light as I have been. In peace, Lis
lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to caption for people who are challenged (deaf, hard of hearing, low vision, etc) in schools, colleges, conferences, and workshops.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: You derserve it!

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: businesses need capital to grow.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: When so little can change someone's life so much, how can I not get invloved!
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers by day and drive my two busy teenagers from place to place at night.

lenders.name: Lissa
lenders.loan_because: It's the smart, just, compassionate, and plain old right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring healing to people through the use of sound and music.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It is amazing to see people actually recieving your money and making their lives better through it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a four-year university in the United States, and am studying to be an Elementary School teacher

lenders.name: Liam
lenders.loan_because:
A lot of government aid ends up in dubious projects run by big multinational companies.
http://www.aidwatch.org.au/

I use this table as part of my loan selection criteria (portfolio yield=interest rate):
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiva_(organization)#Interest_rates

lenders.name: Johnson's
lenders.loan_because: Small Business owner ourselves and we love to help

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help people around the world and to make sure that the help goes to the people that need it.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: When I see that someone is trying to make their life better, I want to help. I like to loan to people that already have a business going and are trying to improve it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes cleaning equipment. My job is mostly with computers and helping the other people I work with to use them.

lenders.name: Remco
lenders.loan_because: it is impressive how kiva connects you to local entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Gerra
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to make a difference in someone's life and to help impoverished nations grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college science majors how to write better.

lenders.name: Elad
lenders.loan_because: I learned a saying in my life, "Sharing is caring". I try to follow it every day.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I'm an independent entrepreneur type of person myself and want to support people who just need a bit of a leg up to start their own businesses. I am so lucky to live in Canada. Even a seemingly small amount of money (to us) can be a huge amount to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for myself doing jewelry design, graphic design, and photography.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed, and all people need is a chance.  We become more compassionate when we help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a performer--I sing opera, and spend much of my life onstage in crazy costumes making a lot of sound!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: When I was a fundraiser I always loved grassroots efforts and Kiva is a champion grassroots initiative - inspiring and effective
lenders.occupational_info: I was a full time mom, then a teacher, then a fundraiser and now I run a website where families and organizations make personalized cookbooks with pictures, recipes and stories

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Someone once loaned to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer at the burn unit at Brooke Army Medical Center in San Antonio Texas.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: it gives me great pleasure to know that what  I give can help someone run their own business, add value to society, and make needed money for their families.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to do something that I know will make a difference in fighting poverty. I also believe in "teaching a man to fish," so microloans are the perfect fit.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Loans are more useful and motivating than charities, and it is a good way to bypass governments, maintaining contact with entrepreneurs at the same time.

lenders.name: Ricky
lenders.loan_because:
Why not you can't take it with you.
To helps others out.
God has blessed me now I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Life is what you make it so why not make it fun.
GO PACK GO

lenders.name: Kelly Westphall
lenders.occupational_info: I am a rancher who works HARD everyday to try to make a better place and mindset for my daughter. My husband and I raise cattle, pigs, chickens, and we also grow fruit trees and save seeds for our own garden. We try to barter almost everything because we don't have the money to buy, but to us that doesn't matter, as long as we can help others and live on just necessities we are VERY happy. Giving back to the land and people is very important and helping others in the community of life is mandatory. :)

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
The smallest good deed is better than the grandest good intention.
- Duguet

No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. 
- Aesop
lenders.occupational_info: Account Executive.

lenders.name: Adriaan
lenders.loan_because: if you have any extra income you should give it to someone who needs it much more that you.  Helping a person get back on their feet or giving them the hope that they can continue on in their endeavor is much more valuable than anything you could buy for yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at Oberlin College in Ohio.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: i believe we can all make a difference, one person at a time...

lenders.name: DaNelle
lenders.loan_because: I want the dreams of the creative people in this world to be realized.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the energy efficiency program for low income residents of the city of Phoenix.

lenders.name: Lea
lenders.loan_because: I hope that this will enable others to enjoy their life and improve their family circumstances
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other businesses to teach them how to improve what they do.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: The EOX supports endeavors that empower people to make positive changes in their lives and the world around them. We donate to Kiva.org directly as well as funding loans to assist program participants.
lenders.occupational_info: Based in the US, the EOX is a member-driven wholesale direct marketplace for individuals, crafters, and small businesses and professionals that want 100% pure, high-quality, truly therapeutic-grade essential oils at co-op prices!

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupational_info: Market Research for Warner Bros. Pictures

lenders.name: Hoan
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping others

lenders.name: Chicago Golds
lenders.occupation: Team of Law, Telecom & 3 Great Kids
lenders.loan_because: For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I firmly believe that business is the key to creating greater wealth rather than simple charity.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with an income (even though minimal) and I like to share it with others, as I believe it can make a big impact in this world. I always have all my needs met, I share my money to help others have their needs met.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher with young children. I work caring for children with single mothers, while their mothers work.

lenders.name: Ashleigh
lenders.loan_because: There should be no more 'have-nots.'
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school for a degree in International Development.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps...
lenders.occupational_info: In the workplace, I help people when they have problems and I also help them achieve goals.

lenders.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur.  I realize we don't get anywhere in life without others.  I just want to make a difference in peoples lives.

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.occupation: Consultant - I am on the right w/ a client
lenders.loan_because: I BELIEVE PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO MAKE THEIR WORLD A BETTER PLACE THROUGH BUSINESS OWNERSHIP AND SERVING THE NEEDS  OF THEIR COMMUNITY DESERVE A HELPING HAND TO GET STARTED AND BE SUCCESSFUL.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A BUSINESS CONSULTANT WHO HELPS COMPANIES OF ALL SIZES BECOME MORE PROFITABLE AND PRODUCTIVE. lenders.name: SON
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Rob Banga
lenders.loan_because: I've seen the devastation that the inescapable cycle of poverty can have on individuals.  I believe  strategically placed capital can have a very positive impact.

lenders.name: wadhwani
lenders.loan_because: I have.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with disabled young people,to help them them get a better quality of life.So they can join aktivity`s when they are not at work at places that are arranged for their handicap.Such as disco,swimming,keep their flat tidy,get dressed,and whatever they need assistance to manage.It is a job that gives me very much back.I feel Ido something very useful,and still gives me a lot of challenge,whichI like in my job!

What he agreed. But I could not do that. But the owner Mr carlos given me the domain name server to me. please check srilankatrekking.com Now I want him to pay that money 100$.

lenders.name: Melita
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to have seen and experienced some amazing things.  During my travels I have been welcomed by those with very limited resources.  Now I have found a great platform to give back...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of a beautiful 7 year old boy.  My job is to nuture this young child into grown man but I hear it won't stop there!

lenders.loan_because: I like to support the work people untertake to improve their life.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because:
"We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop."
-Mother Theresa

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much in this world, and others deserve the same opportunities as me.

lenders.name: Jonathan Cross
lenders.loan_because:
I have traveled a lot in Asia & Eastern Europe and found immense generosity everywhere.  I was often frustrated in my attempts to "help" those disadvantaged by the current economic system and was looking for a constructive way return the generosity.  Giving away money directly to people doesn't work and I am skeptical of large, western NGOs.  

Kiva was a "no-brainer" for me.  In this economy, this is the only investment which guaranteed a positive return!
lenders.occupational_info: I make web pages for Google, volunteer when possible and have spent almost 6 years "on the road" exploring this beautiful earth.

lenders.name: steve p
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been blessed in my life so much and the greatest expression of my gratitude is to bless others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the restaurant business feeding adn servicing guests

lenders.name: Carson

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: we each can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to fly!

Our lives have been blessed in many ways and we hope that our involvement in Kiva helps us pay it forward.

lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Woodfield School
lenders.loan_because: We are a tutor class at Woodfield School in London, UK. We loan so we can see how our money helps people across the world to improve their lives and education.
lenders.occupational_info: We are pupils in Year 9 at Woodfield School and we use Kiva to help us to learn about life in other countries, whilst we help them to improve their lives. Every year a different  Year 9 class works with Kiva and we are the fifth Year 9 class to raise funds and loan through Kiva to help others. We like to loan to people who are starting businesses, working in food production or trying to improve themselves through education (like we are!)

lenders.loan_because: There are no excuses not to

lenders.name: Jessica

lenders.name: James

lenders.name: Hidanovic Family
lenders.loan_because: Such small loans can give people significant power to change their lives. It's the right thing to do, and we're able to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: We also do work that requires the participation of investors. Taking charge of one's own life and working hard to grow one's own business is a big and fulfilling job. We're with you on that!
